pr_title: IGNITE-12773 : Reduce number of cluster deactivation methods in internal API.

timeline.bodyText: There is no cluster deactivation, forceDeactivation should be false.
timeline.author: NSAmelchev

replies.bodyText:
There is no cluster deactivation, forceDeactivation should be false.

Previous invocations were considered forced regardless of certain state. Shouldn't we do the same way?
replies.author: Vladsz83

replies.bodyText: Previous deprecated call was forced internally for both cases. I suggest do not forcing new public method call to cluster activation.
replies.author: NSAmelchev

timeline.bodyText: Can static import be used? like previuos test used
timeline.author: NSAmelchev

timeline.bodyText: GridClientConnection::currentState now unused. Seems can be removed too
timeline.author: NSAmelchev

timeline.bodyText: Why forceDeactivation should be true for cluster activate?
timeline.author: NSAmelchev

replies.bodyText: All previous internal invocations were considered forced. I think we should not change it where not required. Not-forced call are considered only for user commands through command.sh/Rest .
replies.author: Vladsz83

timeline.bodyText: Why forceDeactivation should be true for cluster activate?
timeline.author: NSAmelchev

replies.bodyText: Same. Previous invocations were considered forced. I think we should not change it where not required.
replies.author: Vladsz83

timeline.message: IGNITE-12773 : false flag for cluster activation.
IGNITE-12773 : fix of param description order.

timeline.author: NSAmelchev
NSAmelchev
NSAmelchev

replies.bodyText:
ClusterState.active(ClusterState state) was used.

GridClientClusterState.active() was used, no? Changed to GridClientClusterState.state(). Isn't is ok?
replies.author: Vladsz83

timeline.message: IGNITE-12773 : removed call with isAutoAdjust from the itf.
